translation: This is the mountain of bones. You should know this to be a blessing!

source_sentence: 爾時法增王者，汝身是也。
translation: "At the time, you were King Fazen, the same person.

source_sentence: 緣殺人故，墮大海中，為摩竭魚。
translation: It was because of killing people that you fell into the ocean and became a makara fish.

source_sentence: 汝今既已還得人身，不厭生死，若於此死，當墮地獄，欲出甚難。」
translation: Now that you've regained your body and aren't disillusioned with birth and death, if you die here, you'll fall into hell, and it would be very difficult to escape."

source_sentence: 時尸利苾提既見故身，聞是說已，畏於生死，於所修法，次第憶念，繫心住意，觀見故身，解法無常厭離生死，盡諸結漏，得羅漢道。
translation: After seeing his former body and hearing this, Śrībhūti feared birth and death, remembered what he had cultivated in sequence, bound his mind and attention to it, observed his former body, realized that things are impermanent, became free of birth and death, ended the bonds and contaminants, and attained the path of the arhat.

source_sentence: 目連歡喜，告言：「法子！
translation: Rejoicing, Maudgalyāyana told him, "Dharma son!

source_sentence: 汝今所應作者，皆已作竟。
translation: Now, you've finished doing what you were supposed to do.

source_sentence: 汝來向此，因我力來；汝今可以自神力去。」
translation: You came here because of my strength, and now you can leave by your own spiritual power."

source_sentence: 爾時目連，飛昇虛空，尸利苾提，隨和上後，如鳥子從母，還至竹林。
translation: It was then that Maudgalyāyana flew up into the sky, and Śrībhūti followed him up like a bird whose son followed its mother and returned to the bamboo grove.

source_sentence: 時諸年少，未知得道，如前激刺；尸利苾提心已調順，威儀安詳，默無所陳。
translation: The youngsters, who didn't know they had attained the way, were provoked as before, but Śrībhūti's mind was tamed, his manner was peaceful, and he made no comment.

source_sentence: 佛知此事欲護諸比丘不起惡業故，又欲顯此老比丘德，於大眾中，呼福增言：「汝來福增！
translation: Knowing this, the Buddha wanted to protect the monks from bad karma and to show the virtue of this elderly monk.

source_sentence: 汝今日往大海邊耶？」
translation: Are you going to the edge of the ocean today?"

source_sentence: 福增白言：「實往世尊！」
translation: Fuzeng said, "Really, Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 「汝所見者，今可說之。」
translation: "Now you can tell us what you've seen."

source_sentence: 福增比丘，具白世尊如所見事。
translation: The monk Fuzeng told the Bhagavān exactly what he had seen.

source_sentence: 佛言：「善哉善哉！
translation: The Buddha said, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 福增比丘！
translation: Bhaiṣajyaguru Fudgalyāyana!

source_sentence: 如汝所見事實如是。
translation: As you see it, it's true.

source_sentence: 汝今已離生死之苦，得涅槃樂，應受一切人天供養，比丘所應作事，汝已具足。」
translation: Now that you've parted with the suffering of birth-and-death and have attained the bliss of nirvāṇa, you should accept offerings from all humans and gods, and you've fulfilled the tasks expected of a monk."

source_sentence: 年少比丘，聞佛是語，深懷憂悔：「如是智慧賢善之人，我等無智，惡心刺挊，我等云何受此罪報？」
translation: When the young monk heard what the Buddha said, he deeply regretted, "Such wise and good men, we lack wisdom, and we harshly criticize them with evil intentions.

source_sentence: 時諸比丘，即從坐起，至福增所，五體投地，而作是言：「諸善人生，與悲俱生，大德今生，亦應當與大悲俱生。
translation: The monks then rose from their seats, went to Fuzeng, threw their five bodies to the ground, and said, "Good people are born with compassion, and the great virtuous man in this life should also be born with great compassion.

source_sentence: 唯願於我生憐愍心，受我悔過。」
translation: Please have compassion for me and accept my repentance."

source_sentence: 福增答言：「我於諸人，無不善心，可爾悔過。」
translation: Bokhara replied, "I have no unwholesome thoughts about people, so I can repent of my faults."

source_sentence: 尸利苾提，見諸年少心懷恐怖，即為說法。
translation: Śrībhūti, seeing the youngsters' fearful hearts, spoke for them.

source_sentence: 諸比丘聞，厭生死法，精勤修集，斷結盡漏，得阿羅漢道。
translation: The monks who heard this became disillusioned with the idea of birth and death, diligently cultivated it, cut off the bonds and ended the contaminants, and attained the arhat path.

source_sentence: 福增因緣善名流布遍王舍城，諸人咸言：「甚奇甚特！
translation: Their good reputation for increasing merit spread throughout the city of Rājagṛha, and people everywhere said, "How rare and extraordinary!

source_sentence: 此長老者，於此城中，老耄無施，今於佛法，出家成道，顯說如是希有妙法。」
translation: This elderly man, who was old and unprofitable in this city, now renounces the Buddha's teaching and becomes a monk, revealing such rare and wonderful things."

source_sentence: 時城中人，多發淨心，或有聽放男女奴婢人民令出家者，或自出家者，莫不歡喜相勸出家。
translation: At the time, many people in the city had developed a pure mind, and some of those who heard that men, women, servants, and people had been released from their homes to leave home, or those who had left home themselves, were encouraged to leave home with joy.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，出家功德，無量無邊。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, the merits of becoming a homeowner are measureless and limitless.

source_sentence: 福增百歲，方乃出家，成就如是諸大功德，況諸盛年，欲求妙勝大果報者，應勤修法出家學道，歡喜奉行。
translation: Only when their fortune has increased by a hundred years will they leave home and achieve such great merits, so those in the prime of life who want to pursue the marvelous and great rewards of leaving home should diligently cultivate the Dharma and train on the path, rejoicing and handing it down.

source_sentence: ◎賢愚經卷第四
translation: Śīlabhadra-sūtra, Vol. 4
